data.text: @LeaderHoyer @POTUS SSI hasn’t been updated in 50 YEARS. Raise SSI to The National Poverty Line  $1,132.50. The Disabled shouldn’t be living BELOW Poverty. Also send $2,000 with recurring payments to the low/fixed income during  ongoing 7.5% inflation! #DemolishDisabledPoverty
@LeaderHoyer @POTUS Pothead Harris emboldens our enemies. BTW - Ber highly filtered photo doesn’t look anything like her. https://t.co/Cqrdob3qeJ
